title: President Biden Announces Presidential Delegation to the Republic of Haiti to Pay Respects upon the Death of His Excellency Jovenel Moïse, Former President of the Republic of Haiti | The White House
content: President Joseph R. Biden, Jr. today announced the designation of a Presidential Delegation to the Republic of Haiti to pay respects upon the death of His Excellency Jovenel Moïse, Former President of the Republic of HaitiThe Honorable Linda Thomas-Greenfield, United States Ambassador to the United Nations, will lead the delegation.Members of the Presidential Delegation:The Honorable Michele J. Sison, U.S. Ambassador to the Republic of HaitiThe Honorable Gregory Meeks, Chairman of the House Foreign Affairs CommitteeThe Honorable Jeff Fortenberry, Member of Congress, U.S. House of RepresentativesThe Honorable Daniel Foote, Special Envoy to Haiti, U.S. Department of StateThe Honorable Juan S. Gonzalez, Special Assistant to the President and Senior Director for the Western Hemisphere, National Security Council###
